text:
Getting ready for the first class!  Your homework before the first day is to watch a few TED talks! 

To watch: 
Gene Sandoval’s TED Talk a local Architect and Designer: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_0HaM1B7cOw> 

James’ TED Talk: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0WMqjbZVfwY>

TED Talk: How to Speak so people want to listen:<https://www.ted.com/talks/julian_treasure_how_to_speak_so_that_people_want_to_listen>

attachments.title: Julian Treasure: How to speak so that people want to listen
attachments.text: Have you ever felt like you're talking, but nobody is listening? Here's Julian Treasure to help. In this useful talk, the sound expert demonstrates the how-to's of powerful speaking — from some handy vocal exercises to tips on how to speak with empathy. A talk that might help the world sound more beautiful.
attachments.fallback: TED Video: Julian Treasure: How to speak so that people want to listen

text: I want you all to focus on the flow and the elements of the story. What patterns do you see? What parts were most compelling, why? What didn't work?
